entry.data:
MOSTLY CLEAR
NEAR STEADY TEMPERATURE IN THE UPPER 30S
NORTHEAST WINDS 5 TO 10 MPH

PARTLY SUNNY
HIGHS IN THE MID 50S
EAST WINDS 5 TO 10 MPH

MOSTLY CLEAR IN THE EVENING, THEN BECOMING PARTLY CLOUDY
LOWS IN THE UPPER 30S
EAST WINDS 5 TO 10 MPH

PARTLY SUNNY
HIGHS IN THE UPPER 60S
EAST WINDS AROUND 5 MPH, BECOMING SOUTHWEST IN THE AFTERNOON

MOSTLY CLOUDY
LOWS IN THE MID 30S
WEST WINDS 10 TO 15 MPH, BECOMING NORTH 15 TO 20 MPH WITH GUSTS UP TO 30 MPH AFTER MIDNIGHT

MOSTLY CLEAR
HIGHS IN THE MID 50S
LOWS IN THE MID 30S

MOSTLY CLOUDY
HIGHS IN THE LOWER 60S
LOWS AROUND 50

MOSTLY CLOUDY
SHOWERS LIKELY IN THE AFTERNOON
BREEZY WITH HIGHS IN THE MID 60S
CHANCE OF RAIN 60 PERCENT

SHOWERS, MAINLY IN THE EVENING
LOCALLY HEAVY RAINFALL POSSIBLE IN THE EVENING
BREEZY WITH LOWS IN THE MID 40S
CHANCE OF RAIN NEAR 100 PERCENT

PARTLY SUNNY WITH A CHANCE OF SHOWERS IN THE MORNING, THEN SUNNY IN THE AFTERNOON
HIGHS IN THE UPPER 50S
CHANCE OF RAIN 40 PERCENT

MOSTLY CLEAR IN THE EVENING, THEN BECOMING PARTLY CLOUDY
LOWS IN THE MID 30S
